body.name: taxi
body.description: A custom prebuilt domain for taxi booking
body.examples: book taxi x on friday at 6 pm, take me to Tinga's from Westin hotel with taxi lux

intents.name: book_taxi
intents.examples: book taxi x on friday at 6 pm

intents.name: cancel_taxi
intents.examples: I just called an taxi SUV , please cancel, Cancel my taxi

entities.name: from_place_name
entities.examples: find taxi x to take me to 9th street from space needle

body.name: weather
body.description: A custom prebuilt domain that gets weather forecast and condition
body.examples: Show me the weather for this weekend, What's the weather?

intents.name: get_condition
intents.examples: what's the average temperature in India in September?

entities.name: location
entities.examples: What's the weather like in Minneapolis

entities.name: unit
entities.examples: Please change the weather from Fahrenheit to Celsius
